summary: This replaces Vigilance the dog with a Nix Hound. Vigilance can be bought by Banning in the Markarth stables for 500 gold. If you have the hearthfire dlc, you can also adopt him as a pet if you have children.
descriptionHtml:
This makes Vigilance the dog into a Nix-Hound.

Nix-Hounds are insect-like hounds from Morrowind.

Vigilance can be bought by Banning in the Markarth stables for 500 gold. If you have the hearthfire dlc, you can also adopt him as a pet if you have children.

If you want to make this into a standalone companion, be my guest. You have my permission. If you want to use this to make your own Vigilance replacer, you have my permission. If you're making a creature mod and want to add these to the leveled lists, you have my permission.
author: Gendundrup
